mapper.select: select count(*) from pcomp_role where role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from pcomp_role r where r.role_id in (select urr.role_id from pcomp_user_role_rel urr where urr.user_no=#{userNo})

select
from pcomp_role r where r.role_id not in (select urr.role_id from pcomp_user_role_rel urr where urr.user_no=#{userNo})
mapper.delete: delete from pcomp_user_role_rel where role_id=#{roleId} and user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT r.role_id as roleId, r.role_name as roleName, r.remark as remark, r.is_deleted as isDeleted, CASE WHEN t.roleId IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS bindState FROM pcomp_role r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rel.role_id roleId FROM pcomp_user_role_rel rel WHERE rel.user_no=#{userNo}) t ON r.role_id=t.roleId ORDER BY r.role_id
